subject: HAOS v2 Phase 3 Complete - Next Phase Direction Needed
content: Phase 3 Polish work for HAOS v2 is now COMPLETE. All 8 tasks in PROACTIVE-JOBS.md finished: settings system (user/server/channel), first-run experience, voice/video UI, screen share, and server discovery. Project appears ready for Phase 4 transition. Need your guidance on: 1) Phase 4 objectives and scope, 2) Timeline and priority, 3) Any additional Phase 3 requirements. Currently no active tasks - awaiting direction.
